mapper.select: SELECT F_WTM_GET_EMP_ORG_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, YMD) AS orgNm , A.YMD AS ymd , A.SABUN AS sabun , B.EMP_NM AS empNm , WORK_TYPE_CD AS workTypeCd , TIME_CD_MGR_ID AS timeCdMgrId , WORK_MINUTE AS workMinute , OT_MINUTE AS otMinute , OTN_MINUTE AS otnMinute , NONPAY_MINUTE AS nonpayMinute , PAY_MINUTE AS payMinute , LATE_MINUTE AS lateMinute , LEAVE_MINUTE AS leaveMinute , ABSENCE_MINUTE AS absenceMinute , HOLIDAY_YN AS holidayYn , SUB_YN AS subYn FROM WTM_WORKTIME_DAY_CLOSE A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.YMD BETWEEN B.SYMD AND B.EYMD WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{eYmd}, '-', '') AND IF(#{searchKeyword}='',1=1,(B.SABUN = #{searchKeyword} OR B.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%'))) ORDER BY A.SABUN, YMD

SELECT F_WTM_GET_EMP_ORG_NM(A.TENANT_ID, A.ENTER_CD, A.SABUN, A.EYMD) AS orgNm , A.SABUN AS sabun , B.EMP_NM AS empNm , YM AS ym , WORK_TYPE_CD AS workTypeCd , A.SYMD AS symd , A.EYMD AS eymd , TRUNCATE(BASE_MINUTE/60,2) AS baseMinute , TRUNCATE(BASE_OT_MINUTE/60,2) AS baseOtMinute , TRUNCATE(WORK_MINUTE/60,2) AS workMinute , TRUNCATE(OT_MINUTE/60,2) AS otMinute , TRUNCATE(OTN_MINUTE/60,2) AS otnMinute , TRUNCATE(HOL_MINUTE/60,2) AS holMinute , TRUNCATE(HOL_OT_MINUTE/60,2) AS holOtMinute , TRUNCATE(A_WORK_MINUTE/60,2) AS aWorkMinute , TRUNCATE(A_OT_MINUTE/60,2) AS aOtMinute , TRUNCATE(A_OTN_MINUTE/60,2) AS aOtnMinute , TRUNCATE(A_HOL_MINUTE/60,2) AS aHolMinute , TRUNCATE(A_HOL_OT_MINUTE/60,2) AS aHolOtMinute , TRUNCATE(A_NONPAY_MINUTE/60,2) AS aNonpayMinute , TRUNCATE(A_PAY_MINUTE/60,2) AS aPayMinute , TRUNCATE(LATE_MINUTE/60,2) AS lateMinute , TRUNCATE(LEAVE_MINUTE/60,2) AS leaveMinute , TRUNCATE(ABSENCE_MINUTE/60,2) AS absenceMinute FROM WTM_WORKTIME_MON_CLOSE A INNER JOIN WTM_EMP_HIS B ON A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.EYMD BETWEEN B.SYMD AND B.EYMD WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.YM = REPLACE(#{searchYm}, '-', '') AND IF(#{searchKeyword}='',1=1,(B.SABUN = #{searchKeyword} OR B.EMP_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '%'))) ORDER BY A.SABUN, A.SYMD
